name: OAuth Token by LoginRadius GUID/JWT Encrypted Toke
description: This API allows you to exchange your LoginRadius Access Token or JWT Encrypted Token for OAuth Token

Template Params.name: oauthappname
Template Params.description: The name for the OAuth App you have configured in the LoginRadius Admin Console.

Body Params.name: client_id
Body Params.description: LoginRadius API Key or OAuth Client ID

Body Params.name: client_secret
Body Params.description: LoginRadius API Secret or OAuth Client Secret

Body Params.name: grant_type
Body Params.description: The value should be provided as 'http://loginradius.com/oauth/grant-type/exchange_token'

Body Params.name: token
Body Params.description: LoginRadius Access Token or JWT Encrypted Token
